Blackfang: What the? Hey, Hot, this thing has a Maximal insignia on 
it. You think this can be another pod or a transformer?

He tried to open what seemed to be the control panel...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> ????:
> 
> the piece of metal started to be more and more bigger, soon a 
> maximal's  logo appeared on a lid that protected the controls. The 
> plants covered a thing that had sinze of a averange cibertronian.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Blackfang: Better do so.
> > 
> > He unplugged himself, but still felt weak. He transformed to wolf 
> mode 
> > and came out. He found the old piece of metal and started to sniff 
> it.
> > 
> > Blackfang: This is a cybertronian-made metal, but I can't say 
more.
> > 
> > He starts to scratch it with his claws, hoping the thing will 
react.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > > OOC: You should, perhaps it might be useful to Maximals.
> > > 
> > > The bright continued shining, an old piece of metal was almost 
> > hidden 
> > > under plants and rooths, a piece of metal that was there since 
> the 
> > > first Beast Wars
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> > > > ::Hot Rod::
> > > > 
> > > > There was a bright flash of light, only a few meters away.
> > > > "What on Cybertron was that?!"
> > > > He comes to a screeching hult, and opens his cockpit.
> > > > "You wanna check that out?"
